description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Microsoft brokering file system elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-28907):

1. Install the KB-5036910 update to your system to patch the identified vulnerability.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an improper link resolution issue that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges on the affected system.
- For manual installation and more information, visit the following link: [Microsoft Update Guide](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-28907).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a version compatible with KB-5036910.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
